content: I'm glad you mentioned that about luxury perfumes. I've been wondering if I should've just gone for the cheaper option. Speaking of cheaper options, I've been trying to shop more secondhand, and I recently scored an amazing deal on a gently used designer coat at ThredUp for $100, compared to the original price of $800. Do you think secondhand shopping is a good way to find affordable luxury items, or are there some things that are better off buying new?
